relation: Ottoman sultan Mehmed II captures the capital of the Byzantine Empire
A spanish naval fleet is annihilated by a smaller english fleet commanded by Sir Francis Drake
Early World War I battle where French and British stopped the German invasion just short of Paris
The Turks lay siege to a Greek island defended by Knights Hospitaller
Charles the Hammer repulses a Muslim invasion of France
German colonial forces in East Africa defeat British forces during World War I
The crumbling Roman Empire and its allies repulse an invasion by Attila the Hun
Reconquista battle which saw Spanish forces under Alfonso VIII destroy a Moorish army
Wang Khan betrays Genghis Khan and leads a Kerait army against him. Genghis repulses their attack
Braxton Bragg defeats Union forces under William S. Rosecrans in the western theatre of the US Civil War
Naval battle in which a coalition of European nations defeated the Ottoman Empire
War of 1812 battle which saw Americans under Andrew Jackson defeat an invading British army two weeks after the war ended
Russian mobs revolt, overthrow the Czar, and install a short-lived provisional government
Final desperate offensive by the Germans to win World War I
A Republic of Texas garrison is annihilated by Mexicans under Santa Anna
The 'Ever victorious army' defeats Taipang rebels
The Duke of Wellington defeats Napoleon
Arab Muslims under Umar defeat Sassanid Persians, allowing Islam to spread to Persia
Ivan the Terrible destroys a regional rival, razing their capital to the ground and massacring the inhabitants
Decisive battle in the 30 years war, in which Gustavus Adolphus was killed
An American naval fleet annihilates a Spanish fleet in the Philippines
A surprise offensive by the Vietcong against the Americans and South Vietnamese
A Roman army under Marcus Furius Camillus ejects Gaulic invaders from the Roman capital
Helmuth von Moltke defeats French forces attempting to relieve the Siege of Metz, effectively winning the Franco-Prussian War
Peter the Great defeats Sweden's Charles XII in the Ukraine during the Great Northern War
pageTitle: 50 battles that changed the world Quiz - By Raul654
